agent_get_flights.description: Search for one-way or round-trip flights. This tool provides comprehensive flight search capabilities with extensive filtering and sorting options. Supports filtering by airline, price, duration, departure/arrival times, direct flights, stopovers, and more. Returns detailed flight information including prices, airlines, flight numbers, departure/arrival times, and booking details.

inputs.trip_type: string – required – Type of trip: 'one-way' or 'round-trip'
inputs.departure_date: string – required – Departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-12-10')
inputs.arrival_date: string – optional – Return date for round-trip flights in YYYY-MM-DD format (required for round-trip)
inputs.airline: string – optional – Filter by airline name (e.g., 'American Airlines', 'United', 'Delta')
inputs.max_price: number – optional – Maximum price filter (e.g., 500.0 for $500)
inputs.direct_only: boolean – optional – Only show direct flights (default: false)
inputs.max_duration: integer – optional – Maximum flight duration in minutes (e.g., 480 for 8 hours)
inputs.dep_after: string – optional – Departure time after in HH:MM format (e.g., '08:00')
inputs.dep_before: string – optional – Departure time before in HH:MM format (e.g., '20:00')
inputs.arr_after: string – optional – Arrival time after in HH:MM format (e.g., '10:00')
inputs.arr_before: string – optional – Arrival time before in HH:MM format (e.g., '22:00')
inputs.stopover: string – optional – Filter by stopover airport code (e.g., 'DFW', 'ATL')
inputs.sort_by: string – optional – Sort by 'price', 'duration', 'departure', or 'arrival' (default: unsorted)
inputs.adults: integer – optional – Number of adults (default: 1, minimum: 0)
inputs.children: integer – optional – Number of children (default: 0, minimum: 0)
inputs.infants: integer – optional – Number of infants (default: 0, minimum: 0)

outputs.error: boolean – indicates if an error occurred
outputs.error_code: string – code of the error, if any (VALIDATION_ERROR, TIMEOUT, API_ERROR, UNEXPECTED_ERROR)
outputs.error_message: string – description of the error in LLM-readable format
outputs.outbound: array – list of outbound flight options with details (price, airline, flight numbers, times, duration, etc.)
outputs.return: array – list of return flight options for round-trip (empty for one-way)
outputs.trip_type: string – the trip type that was searched
outputs.suggestion: string – optional suggestion for resolving errors

agent_get_flights_flexible.description: Search for flights with flexible dates. This tool performs flight searches across multiple dates (±days_flex around the specified departure date), allowing users to find the best prices when travel dates are flexible. Perfect for users who want to find cheaper flights by adjusting their travel dates slightly. The tool automatically searches dates around the center date and returns results sorted by price (or specified sort criteria).

inputs.trip_type: string – required – Type of trip: 'one-way' or 'round-trip'
inputs.departure_date: string – required – Center departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-12-10')
inputs.arrival_date: string – optional – Return date for round-trip flights in YYYY-MM-DD format (required for round-trip)
inputs.airline: string – optional – Filter by airline name (e.g., 'American Airlines', 'United', 'Delta')
inputs.max_price: number – optional – Maximum price filter (e.g., 500.0 for $500)
inputs.direct_only: boolean – optional – Only show direct flights (default: false)
inputs.max_duration: integer – optional – Maximum flight duration in minutes (e.g., 480 for 8 hours)
inputs.dep_after: string – optional – Departure time after in HH:MM format (e.g., '08:00')
inputs.dep_before: string – optional – Departure time before in HH:MM format (e.g., '20:00')
inputs.arr_after: string – optional – Arrival time after in HH:MM format (e.g., '10:00')
inputs.arr_before: string – optional – Arrival time before in HH:MM format (e.g., '22:00')
inputs.stopover: string – optional – Filter by stopover airport code (e.g., 'DFW', 'ATL')
inputs.adults: integer – optional – Number of adults (default: 1, minimum: 0)
inputs.children: integer – optional – Number of children (default: 0, minimum: 0)
inputs.infants: integer – optional – Number of infants (default: 0, minimum: 0)
inputs.days_flex: integer – optional – Number of days flexibility (±days_flex around departure_date, default: 3, max: 7)

outputs.error: boolean – indicates if an error occurred
outputs.error_code: string – code of the error, if any (VALIDATION_ERROR, TIMEOUT, API_ERROR, UNEXPECTED_ERROR)
outputs.error_message: string – description of the error in LLM-readable format
outputs.flights: array – list of flight options across multiple dates with details (price, airline, flight numbers, times, duration, search_date, etc.)
outputs.trip_type: string – the trip type that was searched
outputs.days_flex: integer – number of days flexibility used
outputs.suggestion: string – optional suggestion for resolving errors
